entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Things 3
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$49.99 ‚Üí $34.99 [$34.99 ~ $49.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$34.99

Application Description

Get things done! The award-winning Things app helps you plan your day, manage your projects, and make real progress toward your goals. Best of all, it‚Äôs easy to use. Within the hour, you‚Äôll have everything off your mind and neatly organized‚Äîfrom routine tasks to your biggest life goals‚Äîand you can start focusing on what matters today. ‚ÄúThings offers the best combination of design and functionality of any app we tested, with nearly all the features of other power user applications and a delightful interface that never gets in the way of your work.‚Äù ‚ÄîWirecutter, The New York Times KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Your To-Dos Your basic building block is the almighty To-Do‚Äîeach a small step toward a great accomplishment. You can add notes, tag it, schedule it, and break it down into smaller steps. ‚Ä¢ Your Projects Create a Project for any big goal, then add the to-dos to reach it. Use headings to structure your list as you outline your plan. There‚Äôs also a place to jot down your notes, and a deadline to keep you on schedule. ‚Ä¢ Your Areas Create an Area for each sphere of your life, such as Work, Family, Finance, and so on. This keeps everything neatly organized, and helps you see the big picture as you set your plans in motion. ‚Ä¢ Your Plan Everything on your schedule is neatly laid out in the Today and Upcoming lists, which show your to-dos and calendar events. Each morning, see what you planned for Today and decide what you want to do. The rest is down to you :) MORE THINGS TO LOVE As you dive deeper, you‚Äôll find Things packed with helpful features. Here are just a few: ‚Ä¢ Reminders ‚Äî set a time and Things will remind you. ‚Ä¢ Repeaters ‚Äî automatically repeat to-dos on a schedule you set. ‚Ä¢ This Evening ‚Äî¬†a special place for your evening plans. ‚Ä¢ Calendar integration ‚Äî see your events and to-dos together. ‚Ä¢ Tags ‚Äî categorize your to-dos and quickly filter lists. ‚Ä¢ Quick Entry ‚Äî¬†create to-dos from anywhere, as soon as the thought hits you. ‚Ä¢ Quick Find ‚Äî instantly locate to-dos, headings, or tags. ‚Ä¢ Type Travel ‚Äî¬†jump from list to list with your keyboard; just start typing! ‚Ä¢ Widgets ‚Äî see your lists on the desktop or in Notification Center. ‚Ä¢ Mail to Things ‚Äî forward an email to Things; now it‚Äôs a to-do. ‚Ä¢ Markdown ‚Äî¬†structure & style your notes. ‚Ä¢ And much more! MADE FOR MAC Things is tailored to the Mac with deep system integrations as well. A great example is Quick Entry with Autofill: a shortcut that grabs content from other apps and adds it to Things for you, such as a link to a website or an email you want to get back to. You can also enjoy a beautiful dark mode at sunset, connect your calendars, open multiple windows, add a variety of widgets, import from Reminders‚ÄîThings can do it all! There‚Äôs even Shortcuts integration if you want to automate your workflows. STAY PRODUCTIVE ON THE GO Things also has full-featured apps for iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately). All your devices sync seamlessly via our free Things Cloud service. It‚Äôs great to have everything at your fingertips when you need it! AWARD-WINNING DESIGN Made in Stuttgart, with two Apple Design Awards to its name, Things is a fine example of German engineering: designed not only to look fantastic, but to be perfectly functional as well. Every detail is thoughtfully considered, then polished to perfection. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.‚Äù ‚ÄîApple GET THINGS TODAY Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do! Visit our website now and get a free 15-day trial for your Mac: www.things.app If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Things 3
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$6.99

Application Description

Get things done! The award-winning Things app helps you plan your day, manage your projects, and make real progress toward your goals. Best of all, it‚Äôs easy to use. Within the hour, you‚Äôll have everything off your mind and neatly organized‚Äîfrom routine tasks to your biggest life goals‚Äîand you can start focusing on what matters today. ‚ÄúThings offers the best combination of design and functionality of any app we tested, with nearly all the features of other power user applications and a delightful interface that never gets in the way of your work.‚Äù ‚ÄîWirecutter, The New York Times KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Your To-Dos Your basic building block is the almighty To-Do‚Äîeach a small step toward a great accomplishment. You can add notes, tag it, schedule it, and break it down into smaller steps. ‚Ä¢ Your Projects Create a Project for any big goal, then add the to-dos to reach it. Use headings to structure your list as you outline your plan. There‚Äôs also a place to jot down your notes, and a deadline to keep you on schedule. ‚Ä¢ Your Areas Create an Area for each sphere of your life, such as Work, Family, Finance, and so on. This keeps everything neatly organized, and helps you see the big picture as you set your plans in motion. ‚Ä¢ Your Plan Everything on your schedule is neatly laid out in the Today and Upcoming lists, which show your to-dos and calendar events. Each morning, see what you planned for Today and decide what you want to do. The rest is down to you :) MORE THINGS TO LOVE As you dive deeper, you‚Äôll find Things packed with helpful features. Here are just a few: ‚Ä¢ Reminders ‚Äî set a time and Things will remind you. ‚Ä¢ Repeaters ‚Äî automatically repeat to-dos on a schedule you set. ‚Ä¢ This Evening ‚Äî¬†a special place for your evening plans. ‚Ä¢ Calendar integration ‚Äî see your events and to-dos together. ‚Ä¢ Tags ‚Äî categorize your to-dos and quickly filter lists. ‚Ä¢ Quick Find ‚Äî instantly find to-dos or switch between lists. ‚Ä¢ Magic Plus ‚Äî drag the + button to insert to-dos anywhere in a list. ‚Ä¢ Share extension ‚Äî create to-dos with content from other apps. ‚Ä¢ Widgets ‚Äî see lists on your home/lock screens. ‚Ä¢ Mail to Things ‚Äî forward an email to Things; now it‚Äôs a to-do. ‚Ä¢ Markdown ‚Äî¬†structure & style your notes. ‚Ä¢ And much more! MADE FOR IPHONE Things is tailored to the iPhone with deep system integrations as well. A great example is the Share extension, which allows you to create to-dos with content from other apps, such as a link to a website you want to get back to. You can also enjoy a beautiful dark mode at sunset, connect your calendars, add a variety of widgets, create to-dos via Siri, import from Reminders‚ÄîThings can do it all! There‚Äôs even Shortcuts integration if you want to automate your workflows. MADE FOR APPLE WATCH Things comes with a great app for Apple Watch. Just raise your wrist to glance at your Today list, mark to-dos complete as you go, and dictate new ones on the fly‚Äîall synced instantly with your iPhone, iPad, and Mac. AWARD-WINNING DESIGN Made in Stuttgart, with two Apple Design Awards to its name, Things is a fine example of German engineering: designed not only to look fantastic, but to be perfectly functional as well. Every detail is thoughtfully considered, then polished to perfection. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.‚Äù ‚ÄîApple GET THINGS TODAY Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do! ‚Ä¢ Things is also available for Mac, iPad, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately). ‚Ä¢ Sync is provided for free via our Things Cloud service. ‚Ä¢ A free trial is available for Mac: www.things.app If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

entry.title: Be Focused Pro - Focus Timer
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$12.99 ‚Üí $7.99 [Free ~ $12.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$7.99

Application Description

Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It‚Äôs a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac ‚Äî everything stays perfectly in sync. Task Management ‚Ä¢ Create and manage tasks ‚Ä¢ Add notes and due dates to tasks ‚Ä¢ Organize tasks with tags and filters ‚Ä¢ Paste task lists from other apps Timer Control ‚Ä¢ Start, pause, or skip intervals ‚Ä¢ Auto-start the next interval (optionally) ‚Ä¢ Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy ‚Ä¢ Manage completed intervals Timer Customization ‚Ä¢ Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks ‚Ä¢ Define number of intervals before a long break ‚Ä¢ Set a daily goal for completed intervals ‚Ä¢ Assign different timer settings to individual tasks Reports ‚Ä¢ View detailed reports to monitor your progress ‚Ä¢ Export your data in CSV format Sounds and Notifications ‚Ä¢ Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency ‚Ä¢ Variety of alarm sounds ‚Ä¢ Interactive notifications ‚Ä¢ Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer Integration ‚Ä¢ Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) * ‚Ä¢ Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle ** ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow Quick Access ‚Ä¢ Widgets for Lock Screen and Home Screen ‚Ä¢ Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island ‚Ä¢ Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button Automation ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app) ‚Ä¢ Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app Device Support ‚Ä¢ Apple Watch support ‚Ä¢ Also available for Mac ‚Ä¢ Dark and Light mode support * Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately. ** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Arc drop list, guides and quest-line guides. NOT affiliated with Embark. Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord. Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. apple standard EULhttp://www.apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeulaA

entry.title: Invading Horde - TD
entry.content:

Application Description

An Invading Horde has been spotted to the west of the Kingdom. The King has selected a lucky random subject to defend the Realm. You take on the role of the unfortunate farmer tasked with this great undertaking. Build defensive Towers to defeat the Invading Horde.¬† Complete levels to earn Stars to upgrade your Weapons, Obstacles and Magic. Earn Gems to unlock more Towers, Obstacles and Magic. Features ‚óè Fast paced Tower Defense action ‚óè Quirky story line ‚óè Pause the action to plan your strategy ‚óè Cast Magic spells to smite the Horde ‚óè Drop Obstacles in the road to slow down the Horde ‚óè Unlock powerful new Towers, Obstacles, Items and Magic

entry.title: MiniGames Watch Games 24-in-1
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.49 ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

MiniGames is a collection of new, retro and modern games. You can play on your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad with no Ads! It's like your own personal games arcade on the go. This collection of 24 games includes: ‚ñ† PONG Play one of the first video games ever created. This simple tennis like game is an absolute classic. ‚ñ† BRICK BREAK A fun retro falling brick game. Use the Digital crown or your finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to place the brick. Stack the bricks together to clear a line and score some points. ‚ñ† INVADERS Classic arcade action. Shoot all the space invaders before they get you. Hit the mothership for bonus points. ‚ñ† 2048 Enjoy the addictive 2048 game on your watch or phone. Swipe the number tiles around to join them. Join the tiles to reach 2048. ‚ñ† TUBE TWIST Guide your runner down an endless tube. Twist the tube to avoid the holes and spikes. Collect the yellow power orbs, the more you collect the longer you can speed boost. Tap your player to activate your speed boost. Hit the red jumps while boosting to get your bonus score. ‚ñ† BUBBLE Classic match 3 puzzle game. Connect the bubbles by color to clear them. ‚ñ† MISSILE How long can you survive a deadly onslaught of homing missiles? Maneuver your fighter plane to avoid the missiles and make them crash into each other. ‚ñ† HOP Jump from platform to platform to gain more height and points. Shoot the winged baddies along the way. ‚ñ† Drift Enjoy high octane drifting down a treacherous road. One false move and down you go. Try and survive as long as you can to get the top score. Collect the stars for bonus points. ‚ñ† Cong It's like pong, but in a circle. Use the digital crown to move the paddle around the circle and keep the ball in play. ‚ñ† Tower Build your Tower by stacking colourful blocks on top of each other. Place them perfectly for bonus points. ‚ñ† FLAP Guide the bird through a never ending forest by flapping your wings. ‚ñ† FROG ROAD Help the cute frogs avoid the cars and cross the road. A 3D update to the classic Frogger game. ‚ñ† BLOCK RUN Feel like going for a a run? Help the voxel guy avoid the colourful obstacles by jumping, rolling and turning around the corners. ‚ñ† MATCHTRIS A mashup of Tetris and Dr. Mario. Move the falling blocks to match 4 or more colors to clear them. Setup the blocks to fall and match for combos and extra points. ‚ñ† DRONE Pilot your drone down the never ending corridors of an Alien spaceship. ‚ñ† THRUST Strap your rocket boots on and zoom down a dark cave. Thrust combines a classic cave flyer game with elements of flappy bird. ‚ñ† SUPER JUMP We‚Äôve taken the fun of the humble platformer game and mashed it with an endless runner. Keep your player running by jumping over holes, ditches and enemies. Collect fruit to score points and the more you score the faster you run. ‚ñ† RETRO RACER Inspired by pseudo 3d racing games like Outrun and Pole Position but with modern graphics. Enjoy the surreal, exhilarating sense of speed while you race to beat the clock. Please note this game requires a watch series 4 or newer. ‚ñ† CONTRA PANG A mashup of Contra‚Äôs shooting action and the bubble popping fun of Pang. ‚ñ† CIRCLE INVADERS A new twist to the classic Space Invaders. With a unique circular design and lots of power-ups. ‚ñ† MOON SNAKE We took the classic fruit eating snake and put him on the moon. Avoid the bombs and your own tail to survive. ‚ñ† DUAL BREAK What could be better than the classic paddle game Breakout? How about power-ups and an extra paddle to control. ‚ñ† CIRCLE BREAK It‚Äôs like Pong in a Circle meets Breakout. Keep the ball from leaving the circle and break all the obstacles to finish the stage. Features: ‚Ä¢ No ads! ‚Ä¢ Apple Watch support ‚Ä¢ Screen shake ‚Ä¢ Vibrations ‚Ä¢ Sound Effects ‚Ä¢ Music ‚Ä¢ Leaderboards

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Cyber Manhunt
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • Home Sweet HomeÔºö$0.99
  • Hello World!Ôºö$0.99

Application Description

Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches. [Contents] ‚óÜChapter I: Death of a Programmer The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying? ‚óÜChapter II: Invisible Eyes The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women? ‚óÜChapter III: The Evidence Vanishes The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim? ‚óÜChapter IV: The Price of Humiliation The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again! ‚óÜChapter V: Immortal Code When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality? ‚óÜDLC: Home Sweet Home Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?! ‚óÜDLC: Hello World! Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy‚Ä¶ [Features] ‚óÜHighly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents. ‚óÜRich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc.. ‚óÜWonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc... ‚óÜMultiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself. ‚óÜFully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive. ‚óÜOriginal Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio. [Gameplay] ‚óÜWeb Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search. ‚óÜDatabase: You can use the database to get deep information about targets. ‚óÜCrack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms. ‚óÜChat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target. ‚óÜPhishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information. ‚óÜPicture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures. More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Eco inc. Save the Earth
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • +2026 boosters ECO-Initiative!Ôºö$4.99 ‚Üí $4.29 [$4.29 ~ $4.99]
  • +444! Triple-Four Booster PackÔºö$2.29 ‚Üí $2.00 [$2.00 ~ $2.29]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • +100 boosters ECO-Initiative!Ôºö$1.00
  • +2026 boosters ECO-Initiative!Ôºö$4.29
  • +444! Triple-Four Booster PackÔºö$2.00

Application Description

Eco Inc. challenges you with a variety of environmental scenarios ‚Äî from easy to nearly impossible. Your mission is to stabilize Earth's ecosystems and improve the environmental situation on the planet. Every action matters ‚Äî your decisions shape the planet‚Äôs future. Your care leads Earth towards harmony and green development. Game Features: ‚Ä¢ Develop environmental initiatives ‚Ä¢ Discover animals from the IUCN Red List ‚Ä¢ Diverse gameplay mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy ‚Ä¢ Challenging tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic skills ‚Ä¢ Make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising eco-awareness ‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt let an ecological disaster spread across the world like a plague ‚Ä¢ Strategic planning: create long-term plans ‚Ä¢ Volunteering: send your heroes to help, participate in international projects ‚Ä¢ Economic development: manage resources, invest in new technologies, and build a green future Game information is based on open data, the IUCN Red List, and global eco-communities. We have great plans for future updates! Eco Inc. Save the Earth ‚Äî strategy sandbox in the ‚ÄúIncs‚Äù genre from the creators of Religion Inc. Share your ideas and feedback in the comments ‚Äî together with GameFirst, we‚Äôll make the game even better!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Trackless Links Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $19.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors. UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat. WHAT IT DOES ‚Ä¢ Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around ‚Ä¢ Custom redirects (e.g. reddit ‚Üí old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns ‚Ä¢ Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them ‚Ä¢ Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services ‚Ä¢ Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more WHY IT'S USEFUL Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services. TRACKING BLOCKER Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices. URL REDIRECTS Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported. SEARCH ARCHIVE One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device. iCLOUD SYNC Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, tweaks, and statistics sync automatically. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere. BROWSER TWEAKS Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere. KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac ‚Ä¢ Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection) ‚Ä¢ Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity ‚Ä¢ Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically ‚Ä¢ Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps ‚Ä¢ Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules ‚Ä¢ Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users ‚Ä¢ Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering ‚Ä¢ Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity ‚Ä¢ Works offline - no internet connection required DESIGN PRINCIPLES Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms. IMPORTANT NOTES Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental. SUPPORT & FEEDBACK Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues PRIVACY No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device. EULA Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE? Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

Application Description

== Featured in the App Store in 160 countries and regions. == == Repeatedly recommended as Game of the Day in the App Store. == In the distant "Planet", planets burst and civilizations collapse. The residents who lost their "Home" wander above within The Ring. For survival and hope, a group of "Hunters" gather, embarking on an exploration and mission across the shattered continents... ‚Äî Will you become the hunter or the hunted? Your battle decides the future of the planet! ** Game Features ** - Retro and refined pixel style, returning to the "original intention". - Control three characters in real-time for exhilarating combat! - Pixel characters + full body part customization, appearance changes with gear! - Skill combinations + elemental Combos, diverse strategic options! - Classic gear matching + Set skills activation, great Hunters have more than one trick! - No "Energy" limits + unlimited Resource gathering, truly free exploration. - Bizarre Monsters + immensely powerful giant beast Bosses, a challenging adventure on an alien Planet! - Rich character stories + diverse in-depth development, 8+ Hunters take you roaming through the Planet! ------ A Word from the Developers ------ It's been 5 years since the release of our last game "Brutal Street 2" "Creation" is not easy, and innovating while continuing the legacy is even harder, "Home, Planet, and Hunter" has been a labor of love, and we hope you'll like it. From: The 12 buddies at Black Pearl Games Follow us on social media: https://discord.gg/QYpbhswpZu Facebook: www.facebook.com/BlackPearlGames X/twitter: twitter.com/bpgames321 Ins: www.instagram.com/blackpearlgames Threads: www.threads.net/@blackpearlgames

entry.title: LUCH: Photo Effects & Filters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.29 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.59]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters. 20+ HANDMADE FILTERS The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD. FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds. DUST EFFECT Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects. LIGHT LEAKS You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS. BOKEH EFFECT If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects. NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image. You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films. Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

*** Winner of Apple Design Award 2019 *** Thumper is rhythm violence: classic action, blistering speed, and brutal physicality. You are a space beetle. Brave the void and confront a maniacal giant head. With this special pocket edition, you can play all nine epic levels with one hand. Hurtle forward, master new moves, and survive terrifying boss battles. Propelled by a pounding original soundtrack, you'll feel every crushing impact. To reach synesthetic bliss, you must conquer rhythm hell. ‚ñ† Features ‚ñ† „Éª Nine epic levels „Éª Adrenalizing boss battles „Éª Psychedelic visuals and original soundtrack „Éª Smooth 60 FPS in portrait and landscape (and up to 120 FPS on supported devices) „Éª PLAY + mode (increased challenge and speed) „Éª Full screen display on iPhone X „Éª iCloud Sync ‚ñ† Please Note ‚ñ† Wireless headphones can add significant audio latency. For the best experience, wired headphones or integrated speakers are strongly recommended.

entry.title: Pasha Planet: Reborn
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

‚ÄúPasha Planet: Reborn‚Äù is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters‚Äô daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay. [Game Overview] The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes! [Game Features] - Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan. - Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay. - Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes. - Challenging puzzles and stages.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Hyper Light Drifter
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.49 [$2.49 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.49

Application Description

Finally, Heart Machine's award winning slash-'em-up arrives to iOS in the most polished and refined version yet, the Special Edition. ‚ñ∫ Winner of the Audience Award and Excellence in Visual Art awards of the prestigious Independent Games Festival. ‚ñ∫ 14 + nominations among the Best Visual Design, Best Audio and Best original Game categories. ‚ñ∫ 9/10 Destructoid - A hallmark of excellence. There may be flaws, but they are negligible and won't cause massive damage. ‚ñ∫ 9.5/10 Game Informer - The combination of soundtrack, art, and combat creates a rabbit hole worth your full exploration. ‚ñ∫ Eurogamer Recommended - Heart Machine's slash-'em-up is punishing and precise - and incredibly beautiful. ‚ñ∫ 9/10 GameSpot - It is more than simply pretty; Hyper Light Drifter uses its visuals to both guide and relax you. The grandest vistas calm your pulse between difficult, breathless combat sequences. ‚ñ∫ 8.5 Polygon - Hyper Light Drifter deftly mixes contemplative moments with breakneck action. ‚ñ∫ 5 Stars Darkstation - The top-down action-RPG Hyper Light Drifter is an amazing game: gorgeous, a fascinating world to explore, tight controls, beautiful music, and the faith in the player for you to figure things out on your own. Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Drifters of this world are the collectors of forgotten knowledge, lost technologies and broken histories. Our Drifter is haunted by an insatiable illness, traveling further into the lands of Buried Time, hoping to discover a way to quiet the vicious disease. Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16-bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale. Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies. Features: ‚óè 120 fps gameplay on iPad Pro / 60 fps on iPhone and iPad. ‚óè Compatible with MFi controllers. ‚óè Game Center achievements. ‚óè Haptic Vibration. ‚óè From each character to subtle background elements, everything is lovingly hand-animated. ‚óè Easy to pick up, difficult to master; enemies are vicious and numerous, hazards will easily crush your frail body, and friendly faces remain rare. ‚óè Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, discover equipment and traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths and secrets abound. ‚óè Evocative soundtrack composed by Disasterpeace. ‚óè All the content from the original game + more weapons, enemies and areas from the Special edition.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Follow the meaning
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

A desperate letter summons detective Paul Trilby to a peculiar island town, divided by a wall and ruled by a Hospital. Regular citizens get admitted and then return without their memories. A sinister conspiracy is afoot. Can you get to the bottom of this mystery? Use wit, curiosity and lateral thinking to puzzle your way towards a solution, helped by the local citizens you meet along the way. Remember that there is always a grain of truth in the local gossip. Follow the Meaning is a surreal, hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure inspired by classic titles like Samorost and the Rusty Lake series. Features ‚ñ† Hand-drawn art brings the offbeat world to life ‚ñ† Whimsical worldbuilding with a sinister undertone ‚ñ† Atmospheric soundtrack by Victor Butzelaar ‚ñ† A twisted mystery that awaits your diligent inspection ‚ñ† 1.5 hours average playtime

Application Description
